campusmap

Class GeometryFormulas

  • java.lang.Object
    • campusmap.GeometryFormulas

  • public class GeometryFormulas
extends java.lang.Object
    This Utility class contains the methods to solve the CampusMap exercise such as Center of Mass calculation and Average Distance calculation. These calculations are used to move the Central Point instances in the application.

      • computeMomentX

        public static double computeMomentX(double mass,
                                    double coordinateX)
        Parameters:
        mass - the mass of a node. As an example, it can be the area of a JavaFX shape
        coordinateX - the translateX location
        Returns:
        double the MomentX (mass * coordinateX)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
